title: Cortex ML Functions - New column in single-series Forecasting and Anomaly Detection results | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs:
The SERIES column now appears in all Time-Series Forecasting and Anomaly Detection results, instead of just multi-series
results. This change was rolled out in phases and completed on May 10, 2024.
The SERIES column appears only in multi-series Forecasting and Anomaly Detection results. It does not appear in single-series results.
The SERIES column appears in all Forecasting and Anomaly Detection results. In single-series results, this column is NULL in all rows.
For more information on the affected functions, see:
